pages.text: In $(#f00)Battle of Evercraft$(), armor and weapons are essential, and thanks to mods, they are progressive.$(br2)The $(l)Vanilla$() armor/weapons are good for the early stages of the game but provide little protection unless upgraded. That's why there is $(t:Mod that adds unique effects for each trim applied to the armor.)BetterTrims$()($(l:https://github.com/Bawnorton/BetterTrims/blob/stonecutter/README.md)WIKI$()).

pages.title: MC Dungeons
pages.text: Inspired by $(l)Minecraft Dungeons$(), they offer special effects and bonuses suited for various playstyles, which pair well with the appropriate weapons.

pages.title: RPG
pages.text: The $(8)$(l)RPG$() armor and weapons are easy to obtain, ideal for the early stages due to the bonuses that improve class abilities.

pages.title: Lost Paradise
pages.text: With superior durability and offensive upgrades, the armor and weapons of $(6)$(l)Lost Paradise$() are perfect for tackling more challenging fights.

pages.title: Aquamirae
pages.text: Perfect for underwater exploration, the armor and weapons of $(b)$(l)Aquamirae$() improve mobility in water and make ocean encounters less disadvantageous.

pages.title: BetterNether
pages.text: Forged to face the dangers of the Nether, the armor and weapons of $(4)$(l)Betternether$() provide advanced protection against fire, using it against infernal mobs.

pages.title: BetterEnd
pages.text: Suited for the challenges of the End, the armor and weapons of $(3)$(l)Betterend$() offer high durability and specific advantages to survive in this hostile dimension.

pages.title: Dragon Loot
pages.text: Made with dragon scales, the armor and weapons of $(5)$(l)Dragon Loot$() provide exceptional protection and increase offensive power to ideal levels for the end-game.

pages.title: Deeper & Darker
pages.text: Representing the highest level of power, the armor and weapons of $(1)$(l)Deeper & Darker$() are designed to face the darkest and deadliest creatures of the modpack, offering ultimate defense and offense.
